about_the_game:
1, you live in a small town, where you can cultivate the farmland in front of your house, make it vibrant, you can point animals, cats and dogs, to accompany yourself.

2, when you have more money, you can expand your production scale, rent more land, use machinery and equipment to improve your production efficiency.

3, if you don't like to work, you can also go to the town shop to work, when you have enough money, you can also rent a store, own a store.

4, this is a real social life as much as possible, you can do what you want to do, but it will also have some different Settings, some strange creatures that do not exist in reality will appear in this world.
detailed_description:
1, you live in a small town, where you can cultivate the farmland in front of your house, make it vibrant, you can point animals, cats and dogs, to accompany yourself.

2, when you have more money, you can expand your production scale, rent more land, use machinery and equipment to improve your production efficiency.

3, if you don't like to work, you can also go to the town shop to work, when you have enough money, you can also rent a store, own a store.

4, this is a real social life as much as possible, you can do what you want to do, but it will also have some different Settings, some strange creatures that do not exist in reality will appear in this world.
name: QiuQiu Town
short_description: You have come to this new world, where you will start a new life, have many options, run the farm, scale up, and become a great agriculturist. Or run a store and become a business mogul. Or ordinary life every day, if you were given the chance to do it again, what would you choose?
